identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a wine pairing experience that feels like a personal sommelier's private cellar—intimate, sophisticated, and unhurried.
core_values: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Italian warmth.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like the first sip of a good vintage.
Content is King: The wine bottle and the food plate are the heroes.
Negative Space: Luxury is the absence of clutter.

heading.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use italic variants for emphasis.

usage.primary: Call-to-action buttons, active states, key highlights.
usage.secondary: Backgrounds for cards, sidebars, secondary buttons.
usage.accent: Gold touches for ratings, premium badges, selection borders.

spacing.philosophy: Generous. Use 2-3x more whitespace than standard SaaS apps.
rules: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Section gaps should be large (py-20 or py-32).

bento.description: Dense grid for the 'My Cellar' view.
bento.rules: Use h-full on children to ensure equal height.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or full pill. No default rounded-md.
buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-sm font-medium tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 active:scale-95

cards.style: Minimalist. Either flat with border or glassmorphism.
cards.classes: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.classes: bg-transparent border-b border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 py-4

navigation.style: Floating glass dock or minimal top bar.
navigation.classes: fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-4 shadow-2xl z-50

motion.philosophy: Fluid and organic. Like wine swirling in a glass.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
Dark mode should not be pure black (#000000), use tinted charcoal (#0F0E0E).
Images must be high quality and treated with a subtle overlay if text is over them.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end, conscious wine pairing app. The user wants 'Elegant & minimalist'. Do not build a generic e-commerce site. Focus on the 'Sommelier' aspect—guidance, storytelling, and discovery. Use the provided image URLs for the prototype. Implement the 'Tetris' grid for the landing page and 'Bento' grid for the cellar. Use the defined color palette strictly.
